title: Invisible Threat Gaming is looking for a Team Manager (m/f)

embed.description: Invisible Threat Gaming is looking for an experienced and innovative League of Legends Manager that willing to help his team reach the goal of the OPL. This position will have the candidate managing the team roster and assisting the coaching staff by managing practice schedules and working closely with the players.

body:
We are looking forward to your applications.
-ITG Staff

replies.body: Is this legit. I can do it, have had plenty of experience, not messing around with the applications tho. You can contact me through my ign or through Skype Jordans2131@outlook.com I'd like an actual meeting or else I'm not interested.
Its on the policy of every organization not to talking publicly about their contracts. Contact us at theo.matrapilias@invisiblethreat.net to get informed.

> [{quoted}](name=SSG dezero19,realm=EUW,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=fQcLYOkB,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-10-30T10:04:35.120+0000)
>
> Its on the policy of every organization not to talking publicly about their contracts. Contact us at theo.matrapilias@invisiblethreat.net to get informed.

Oh damn okay, tyvm! Loool. I'm a naturalist though (perve on my hp bar to see how much damage enemies do to me before going all in or farming + checking items first) lol.
